adDetails: Dear Parents of a Fellow Musician, Summer is a great time to start playing an instrument or to deepen one's playing because no busy school schedule is distracting from focusing on the process of trying out or further mastering an instrument. I am an experienced and dedicated piano teacher and will be offering summer intensives for elementary through intermediate piano players in the following categories: 30-min/45-min/60-min regular piano lessons for one student - $40/$55/$70 Duet Intensives: Four 60-minute lessons in one week - $140,- for each duet partner Composition Intensives* for a single student: Six 60-minute lessons in 2 weeks - $390,- Composition Intensives* for groups of 2 - 4 students: Six 60-minute lessons in 2 weeks - $210/$140/$110 for each student in groups of 2/3/4 *Composition Intensives may include painting, incorporating other instruments, improvisation - examples of one type of composition can be found on my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXDlf0g7mo9BCgaSBeU2XZTf1hsi_0GrI All prices are summer specials only and workshops will start July 1, 2014. Please visit my website www.pianolessonsinberkeley.com or my youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/user/SusannesPianoStudio to find out more about my teaching approach and philosophy. Please contact me via email at susanne_piano@hotmail dot com or call me at show contact info I am looking forward to hearing from you! Susanne 'Music produces a kind of pleasure which human nature cannot do without.' --Confucius
